word_mean: 某一水域单位水体或生物群落中某一种生物的个体数量。
表示一个种群在群落中个体数目的多少或丰富程度的指标。

sentence.Network_en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentence.Network_en: At the feast there was food and drink in abundance.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... absurdity n． 荒谬 abundance n． 充裕，多量 abuse v．n． 辱骂，滥用.
英汉地质词典 - 豆丁网 ... abukum alite 铋磷灰石 abundance 丰度 abundance of elem ents 元素丰度.
BEC中级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... abject a. 不幸的，可怜的；卑鄙的 abundance n. 丰富；充足 abnormal a. 变态的，不正常的.
词汇复习指导：GRE背词新思路-GRE考试-考试大... ... purveyance 伙食，承办伙食 abundance 充裕，富足 radiance 发光，灿烂，容 …

list.abs: 《数学专业英语词汇》 - 豆丁网 ... absurdity 谬论 abundance ratio 丰度比 abundant number 过剩数.
coseparation 同时分离cosmic abundance 宇宙丰度cosmic background radiation 宇宙背景辐射
这项由施密特负责的研究还显示，各个国家的滥交程度随男人“相对丰度(relative abundance)”的变化而变化。在中国、日本和韩国等东亚国家，男人数量多于女人数量，而不承担责任的临时性行为水平相对.
isotope-isomerization 同位素异构作用isotopic abundance 同位素分丰度; 同位素丰度; 同位素丰富度-

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Latin abundantia, from abundant- 'overflowing', from the verb abundare (see abound)

entry.def: An abundance of something is a large quantity of it.

example.ex: The area has an abundance of wildlife...
example.tran: 这片地区有丰富的野生动植物。

means.word_mean: 1. the property of a more than adequate quantity or supply;
2. (physics) the ratio of the number of atoms of a specific isotope of an element to the total number of isotopes present
3. (chemistry) the ratio of the total mass of an element in the earth's crust to the total mass of the earth's crust; expressed as a percentage or in parts per million

auth_sentence.content: Seeps of petroleum happen anywhere petroleum occurs in abundance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seeps of petroleum happen anywhere petroleum occurs in abundance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seeps of petroleum happen anywhere petroleum occurs in abundance.

auth_sentence.content: We arrived in Marrakech to an abundance of light.
auth_sentence.res_content: We arrived in Marrakech to an abundance of light.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We arrived in Marrakech to an abundance of light.

auth_sentence.content: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.
auth_sentence.res_content: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多余的,过剩的;[食物]丰富的;被解雇的
stems_affixes.word_buile: red反复+und波动+ant……的→反复波动→多余的
fec=fic做+und波动+ity表名词→出产的[粮食]像波浪→丰富,富饶
ab加强+und波动+ance表名词→[多得]像波浪一样→丰富
red回+ound=und波动→波动回来→回流,产生影响
ab加强+ound=und波动→[多得]像波浪一样→丰富
in进入+und波动+ate表动词→进入波浪,淹没

sentences.en: There was an abundance of corn last year.
At the party there was food in abundance.

jushi.english: There was an abundance of corn last year.
Maidenhair trees grow in rich abundance in the area.
jushi.chinese: 这个地区长着许多银杏树。

jushi.english: There was an abundance of food.
